dct_title_s: Tabula geographica hemisphærii borealis ad emendatiora quæ adhuc prodierunt exempla
dct_description_sm: Map of Northern Hemisphere; relief shown pictorially. In lower right -hand corner: 3. Hemisphærium Boreale. From: Atlas geographicus omnes orbis terrarum regiones in XLI tabulis exhibens ... / jussu Academiae Regiae Scient. et Eleg. Litt. Boruss. ad emendatiora... descriptus. Berolini : ex officina Michaelis, 1753. Preface to Atlas geographicus by Leonhard Euler. Publisher's ink stamp in lower right-hand corner.
